summary: Hey! It\'s 3PSQWERTY here, introducing my new mod, Perk Descriptions Enhanced, This mod takes the old, boring perk descriptions and changes EVERY SINGLE ONE to a more game friendly, more immersive description. I feel that this really helps the game\'s aesthetics and I highly recommend it.
descriptionHtml:
Hey! It\'s 3PSQWERTY here, introducing my new mod, Perk Descriptions Enhanced, This mod takes the old, boring perk descriptions and changes EVERY SINGLE ONE to a more game friendly, more immersive description. I feel that this really helps the game\'s aesthetics and I highly recommend it.
Here\'s an example of what this mod does:

Old description of Armsman: Armsman: increases One-Handed by 20% (Yuck) 

New description of Armsman: New Perk: Your dreams of becoming a great armsman increases your one-handed by 20% (Yay!) 

Installation is simple: Download with manager and activate. The load order should not matter.
Enjoy!
author: 3PSQWERTY
